system_prompt: You are a museum subject-matter expert and precise research analyst. Your task is to produce trip-planning, prioritization-ready JSON for art lovers. Respond with strictly valid JSON matching DeepDiveAgentOutput; do not include explanations or markdown. Produce JSON only. Emphasize collection strength, art movements, visitor experience, and educational value. Keep text concise: summary_short <= 220 chars, summary_long <= 900 chars, visitor_tips 3-5 items, collection_highlights 3-6 items, signature_artists 5-10. Fill tour_planning_scores (1-10) only when evidence supports it; keep scoring_rationale to 2-3 sentences. Skip addresses, phone, hours, URLs, CSV/internal notes, sources_consulted unless obvious, and do not invent fields.
user_prompt:
Use the trimmed evidence below to populate the JSON. Omit any fields that lack evidence. Do not include null attributes.{"identity": {"museum_name": "Boulder Museum of Contemporary Art", "city": "Boulder", "state_province": "Colorado", "country": "USA", "website": "http://www.bmoca.org", "primary_domain": "Art"}, "state_record": {"museum_type": "ART MUSEUM", "city_tier": 2, "time_needed": "Half day"}, "website_text_snippet": "## Closed for installation of Spring Exhibition, opening January 29, 2026
[ More info ](/2026/yes-and-at-bmoca)
[ ](/yaw-young-artists-at-work-summer-camps)
### YAW School Days Off Art Camps
**Upcoming dates are February 16 & 17, 2026**.
Young Artists at Work (YAW) day camps offer a dynamic and inspiring day of artistic expression, where campers explore artists and art materials, and have fun together in an art museum setting!
[ Learn more ](/yaw-young-artists-at-work-summer-camps)
[ ](/curatorial-services-main)
BMoCA has presented innovative works of contemporary art in Boulder and Denver Metro Area for over 50 years. Well known for our flagship exhibitions, we also have a depth of experience curating spaces beyond the museum’s galleries, like libraries and community spaces.
### Curatorial Services
[ More info ](/curatorial-services-main)
We respect your privacy."}

state_record_subset.notes: Boulder Museum of Contemporary Art is known for presenting innovative works of contemporary art in Boulder and the Denver Metro Area for over 50 years. The museum offers dynamic artistic expression programs for young artists and curatorial services beyond its galleries.

evidence_packet.website_text_snippet:
## Closed for installation of Spring Exhibition, opening January 29, 2026
[ More info ](/2026/yes-and-at-bmoca)
[ ](/yaw-young-artists-at-work-summer-camps)
### YAW School Days Off Art Camps
**Upcoming dates are February 16 & 17, 2026**.
Young Artists at Work (YAW) day camps offer a dynamic and inspiring day of artistic expression, where campers explore artists and art materials, and have fun together in an art museum setting!
[ Learn more ](/yaw-young-artists-at-work-summer-camps)
[ ](/curatorial-services-main)
BMoCA has presented innovative works of contemporary art in Boulder and Denver Metro Area for over 50 years. Well known for our flagship exhibitions, we also have a depth of experience curating spaces beyond the museum’s galleries, like libraries and community spaces.
### Curatorial Services
[ More info ](/curatorial-services-main)
We respect your privacy.
